description: Play on words with 'lactose' sounding like 'lack toes.'
title: Cow's Dilemma
n_1: Daisy discusses her new diet in the field.
n_2: Bessie is curious about Daisy's health trend.
n_3: Daisy tries to explain the impact of her condition.
c1_3: Yeah, no more cheese or milk.
c2_3: So, what happens if you do?
n_4: Daisy delivers the punchline with a playful smirk.
c1_4: Well, I just can't stand toes!
c2_4: Oh, you and your cow puns!
